title: Geekbench scores appear for new Snapdragon-powered Surface device
content:
It’s been well over two years since Microsoft unveiled the Surface Pro X, its first ARM-based PC since the ill-fated Windows RT-powered Surface RT and Surface 2. Since then, the Pro X has received two very minor refreshes. A year after the first one came out, there was a new one with an SQ2 processor.

The post Geekbench scores appear for new Snapdragon-powered Surface device appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Geekbench scores have appeared for what's likely to be Microsoft's next-generation Surface Pro X, with a Snapdragon 8cx Gen 3.
